scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate --settings=core.settings_heroku && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --settings=core.settings_heroku && python manage.py shell --settings=core.settings_heroku -c "from billing.models import Plan; Plan.objects.get_or_create(name='Starter', plan_type='starter', price_monthly=29, price_yearly=290, max_queries_month=1000, max_users=5, max_storage_gb=10, max_agents=1); Plan.objects.get_or_create(name='Professional', plan_type='professional', price_monthly=99, price_yearly=990, max_queries_month=10000, max_users=25, max_storage_gb=100, max_agents=3, api_access=True); Plan.objects.get_or_create(name='Enterprise', plan_type='enterprise', price_monthly=499, price_yearly=4990, max_queries_month=-1, max_users=-1, max_storage_gb=-1, max_agents=-1, api_access=True, priority_support=True, custom_branding=True, advanced_analytics=True, sso_integration=True)"
